document_data.mainbody: '''First Circle''' was a loose pantheon of the gods of nature worshiped by the [[druids]] in the late 15th century [[DR]]. The circle was made up of [[Auril]], [[Chauntea]], [[Eldath]], [[Malar]], [[Mielikki]], [[Silvanus]], [[Talos]], andÂ [[Umberlee]], who were considered the first among druids. Any given [[druid circle]] might worship some or all of these and most druids counted them all as worthy of veneration.<ref>
